data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Eibar close to the penalty box.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Eibar.
Goal! Real Madrid have got their heads in front thanks to a Karim Benzema strike.
Great play from Rodrygo to set up the goal.
In the minute 7, In Eibar Real Madrid drive forward through Lucas Vazquez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal kick for Eibar at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Eibar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Real Madrid extend their lead to 0-2 through Luka Modric.
Karim Benzema with an assist there.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Real Madrid at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Real Madrid's Karim Benzema attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Eibar a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Eibar are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
Free kick Eibar.
In the minute 21, Anaitz Arbilla of Eibar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Corner awarded to Eibar.
Real Madrid are whistled for offside.
In the minute 26, Real Madrid needs to be cautious. Eibar have an attacking throw-in.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kike strikes to reduce the deficit to 1-2 at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
In the minute 28, That's a fine assist from Kevin Rodrigues.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the away team in Eibar.
Eibar advance rapidly upfield but Jose Luis Munuera Montero blows for offside.
Real Madrid drive forward but Karim Benzema is judged offside.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Eibar at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Real Madrid.
Yoshinori Muto for Eibar gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
In the minute 40, Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the home team a throw-in.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
In the minute 43, Anaitz Arbilla for Eibar has been booked by Jose Luis Munuera Montero and receives a first yellow card.
Real Madrid are pushing forward but Sergio Ramos's finish is wide of the goal.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Eibar a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Real Madrid will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Eibar.
At Ipurua Municipal Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Can Eibar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
In the minute 45, Lucas Vazquez for Real Madrid drives towards goal at Ipurua Municipal Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Real Madrid push forward at Ipurua Municipal Stadium and Karim Benzema gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Eibar defence.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
The second half has started at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Madrid in Eibar.
In the minute 48, At Ipurua Municipal Stadium, Real Madrid are penalized for being offside.
In Eibar Real Madrid attack through Karim Benzema. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Eibar at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
In the minute 50, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Madrid's Rodrygo breaks free at Ipurua Municipal Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In the minute 53, Eibar have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
In the minute 56, Eibar's Takashi Inui gets in a shot on goal at Ipurua Municipal Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Eibar.
Eibar's Takashi Inui gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the away team in Eibar.
Real Madrid's Karim Benzema has run offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Eibar.
Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Eibar Eibar attack through Yoshinori Muto. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 60, Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Eibar.
Throw-in for Eibar in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Eibar's half.
In the minute 68, Real Madrid's Rodrygo is on target but unsuccessful.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a throw-in for Real Madrid, close to Eibar's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Eibar goal kick.
In the minute 69, Real Madrid have a dangerous throw-in.
Eibar surge into the attack at Ipurua Municipal Stadium but Yoshinori Muto’s header is off-target.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Pedro Leon is on a sub for Takashi Inui for Eibar.
The away team replace Luka Modric with Federico Valverde.
Marco Asensio is replacing Rodrygo for the away team.
In the minute 73, In Eibar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Real Madrid are coming forward and Marco Asensio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Eibar at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
In the minute 76, Eibar to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Eibar.
Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the away team in Eibar.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Eibar throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
Can Eibar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
In the minute 81, Eibar to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
Free kick Eibar.
The home team have replaced Pape Diop with Sergio Alvarez. This is the second substitution made today by Jose Luis Mendilibar.
Eibar have a goal kick.
Eibar push upfield but Jose Luis Munuera Montero quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 83, Jose Luis Mendilibar (Eibar) is making a third substitution, with Unai Arietaleanizbeaskoa Bergara replacing Kike.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Ball safe as Eibar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Eibar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Eibar's half?
In the minute 88, Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a throw-in for Real Madrid, close to Eibar's area.
Real Madrid push upfield but Jose Luis Munuera Montero quickly pulls them for offside.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Goal! Lucas Vazquez extends Real Madrid's lead to 1-3.
Karim Benzema instrumental with a fine assist.
